A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I absolutely love this movie. I felt that Star Wars: The Last Jedi was beautifully written. I understand why people have disagreed with Rian Johnson's vision\, however\, I love the original story that he brought into the franchise. I'll admit\, I was surprised to see the changes made by Johnson but\, I think that a majority of the film flowed together with that same Star Wars spunk we all know and love. There was one storyline in the film that I found to drag slightly in the middle of the film. Other than that\, I really don't have a problem with anything else in the movie. Growing up with Star Wars\, I am really happy with the latest installment. In truth\, I think that The Last Jedi should not be seen as\, \"too different\" but as something that can continue to inspire us just like the original trilogy did.
